import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { actToggle } from '../redux/actions' import { toggleSelector } from '../redux/selector' export default function Control() { const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleAddStudent = () => { const action = "ADD" dispatch(actToggle(action)) } const handleChange = (e) => { setInputValue(e.target.value) } const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(actToggle(inputValue)) } return (
) }
